input_text:
Job Title: Stand Up Forklift Operator - 1st shift Romeoville (6:30 - 3:00pm; M-F)

Location: Romeoville, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Description

POSITION OVERVIEW

The Forklift Operator is responsible for safely operating forklifts to ensure order fulfillment. Additional responsibilities include loading, unloading, picking, putting away, and consolidating products using a forklift.

Pay Range: $19.69 - $20.69

Position Responsibilities

 Proficient in all Senior Warehouse Associate job responsibilities Primary responsibility is to safely operate stand-up or sit-down forklift for order fulfillment Manually case pick for order fulfillment as needed Load, unload, pick, put away, and consolidate products Prepare product for shipping Conduct audits on outbound loads and correct mislabeled items and shortages Ensure replenishment of products in appropriate bays Perform other duties as assigned

Job Qualifications

Satisfies all Senior Warehouse Associate job qualificationsForklift certifiedAt least six months of related work experience

Skills Required For Certification

Job Specific

 Guided Training - up to 40 hoursForklift Operation TrainingForklift Certification Functional Process TrainingBattery and Propane Safety Training Battery or Propane CertificationAll Training Required for Warehouse Associate and Senior Warehouse Associate GeneralCurrent CJ Safety & Compliance Training 

WORK ENVIRONMENT:

This job operates in a warehouse environment.

CJ Logistics About Statement:

CJ Logistics delivers integrated and multimodal logistics services, connecting every corner of the world via air, sea and land. As a lead logistics partner (LLP), third-party logistics provider (3PL) and supply chain consultant, we help customers leverage supply chain management as a competitive advantage, reducing total system costs, transforming business processes, improving service and facilitating growth and change. With a focus on social responsibility and sustainability through growth with customers and communities, we prioritize the wellbeing of the end consumer, our customers and our employees. CJ Logistics America is responsible for the North America region, specializing in solutions for regulated industries such as food and beverage, consumer-packaged goods, healthcare and medical supplies, and tire and automotive.

CJ Logistics is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We prohibit discrimination and or/harassment of any type, including but not limited to discrimination and or harassment based upon race, religion, religious creed, color, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, pregnancy or relation medical conditions, childbirth, breastfeeding, parental status, veteran and/or military statue, disability (physical or mental) medical condition, genetic information or characteristics, political affiliation, domestic violence survivor status, marital status, or other characteristics prohibited by federal, state, or local law. Additionally, CJ Logistics America participates in the E-Verify program in certain locations.

Please note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change at any time with or without notice.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
